StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetImportEvents]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ImportEventStatusTypeId smallint, @ImportTypeId smallint, @DateFrom date.me = null, @DateTo date.me = null
AS
DECLARE @SQL VARCHAR(8000)
SET @SQL='SELECT * FROM [usmc].[ImportEvent] IE WHERE IE.ImportEventStatusTypeId=' + CAST(@ImportEventStatusTypeId AS VARCHAR(10)) + ' AND ImportTypeId=' + CAST(@ImportTypeId AS VARCHAR(10))
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
IF @DateFrom is not null AND @DateTo is not null BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' AND (' + 'IE.DateObtained >= ''' + convert(varchar(20), @DateFrom) + ''' AND IE.DateObtained <= ''' + convert(varchar(20), @DateTo) + ''')' END
IF @DateFrom is not null AND @DateTo is null BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' AND (' + 'IE.DateObtained >= ''' + convert(varchar(20), @DateFrom) + ''')' END
IF @DateFrom is null AND @DateTo is not null BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' AND (' + 'IE.DateObtained <= ''' + convert(varchar(20), @DateTo) + ''')' END
SET @SQL = @SQL + ' ORDER BY IE.DateObtained DESC' PRINT(@SQL) EXEC(@SQL)
END
